授業方法:
For the Fall semester 2021, this course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.

< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand video will be recorded and made available via Google Classroom. Students need to check LUNA for more details on accessing Google Classroom

Students will engage in discussions with partners and small groups, make presentations, debate, and use English for communicative tasks. As part of online instruction, students will participate in online discussions, create videos, and do listening exercises with online audio and video resources.
